ELV and Electronics Specialists

We are ELV and Electronics Specialists

With over 90 years combined technical experience including Electronics Hardware and software design you can be sure we have a solution for your facility. We divide our services into two separate companies. These are SAFECo Pty Ltd and SAFE Integrated Systems Pty Ltd. More information is provided below where you can also be redirected to the appropriate website.

SAFE Integrated Systems Pty Ltd

SAFE Integrated Systems is a well-established commercial ELV (Extra Low Voltage) one stop shop specialist in Nurse Call systems, Paging systems, RFID, Fire Detection and Emergency Warning Intercom Systems (EWIS), Audio Visual Systems, SMATV systems, Automation systems, Intercom systems, CCTV, Access control and Security.
